data.text: @liverpoolimages @HeritageRoofing @AmazingLiverpo1 Yeah iv seen them fantastic I’d love to get in there and look around like a time capsule
@HeritageRoofing @liverpoolimages Seen them on this @AmazingLiverpo1 fantastic doorways in Liverpool

@liverpoolimages I like to think of all the hands that have touched it through the generations, the hands that have polished it, the news it has been delivered through it  both good and bad. I love the way it conjures images of Romans. It has character and magnificence. So there.
@liverpoolimages How about these doors on Water Street Dave! Near the India Building, don’t think I’ve seen doors as impressive. Straight out of Hogwarts https://t.co/FArVfWwMqv
@liverpoolimages Did you ever imagine yourself saying you love a letterbox 😂
